entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except 90 gusting to 110 through mainland inlets and valleys. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except 90 gusting to 110 through mainland inlets and valleys in the morning and early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
